alert.note: Alert for Western Siskiyou National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 13 at 1:33PM PDT until August 14 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR HAINES 6 WITH EXISTING FIRE FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 619... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 8 PM PDT MONDAY FOR HAINES 6 WITH EXISTING FIRE FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 619... The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a Red Flag Warning over the Flat Fire, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM PDT Sunday, and from 2 PM to 8 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Dry and unstable conditions may lead to rapid fire growth on existing fires with plume dominated behavior possible. * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon...Fire weather zone 619...including the Flat Fire and portions of the Rogue River-Siskiyou National Forest. * HAINES...6. * ADDITIONAL INFO...View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. These conditions promote rapid spread of fire which may become life threatening. Evacuate if ordered to, or if a fire threatens.
